content: In addition, we continue to assembly and test our first two synthetic aperture radar satellites, our SAR constellation represents highly attractive economics, and we're pursuing the opportunity consistent with our available capital resources. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. It'll tabulate once they've launched, but the Ukraine has really demonstrated the need for synthetic amateur radar and has really -- it's solidified why it's so important, and we're seeing lots of inquiries from customers about other things -- other types of things that you do with SAR, and other advances to different SAR products. Your line is open.
